storyInfo: A rebel appears inside Babel, and the target of the attack seems to be the Doctor. Scout arrives in time and detains the intruder, but the Doctor and Theresa have different ideas for how to deal with him.

attributes.content: 'Dr. {@nickname}?'
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: You're saying that... the two of you have known each other for a long, long time?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Don't worry, I'm just a bit nervous. After all, you've known the Doctor for longer than you've known me, and I would like to leave a good first impression.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: There's just one thing though. Kal'tsit, you have some concerns about the kind of person the 'Doctor' is now, right? It's written all over your face.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Let me find out as well, Kal'tsit. I'm really curious, what sort of person is that 'Doctor' who is so closely connected to your past?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: How should I go about it...? Meeting this Doctor, exchanging pleasantries, connecting the Doctor to myself and the Sarkaz... These are all questions I have to answer for myself.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: My opinion... can influence you as well, yes?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: So, Kal'tsit, take me to see the Doctor, won't you?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Good work, Scout.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: It was just a recon mission, part of my job.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Hmm... Where are Kal'tsit and the Doctor?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: The conference room... Is something wrong?
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Our spy in the Military Council has returned our intelligence. They don't intend to give us any breathing room...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Unfortunately.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: A spy... Are you talking about that Vampire noble? Your Majesty, I believe she only answers to the Prince of Blood, and is untrustworthy.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Most of them are nothing more than speculators looking out after their own interest. Unless forced by the situation, I doubt she would even enter the war...
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Of course. I understand your concerns, Scout.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: But at least for now, she won't lie to me. She hasn't worked up the courage for that yet.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Kal'tsit? Doctor? Are you two busy?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Your Majesty. Is your meeting over?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yes, but the results aren't exactly a cause for celebration.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Am I interrupting your work? By the way, since I rarely get out of my meetings before noon, would you like to have lunch with me, Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: It's too early.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Huh? Oh... I suppose it is.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: No, I meant to say, you're a lot earlier than usual.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's hard to imagine that the people in the Chairman's office would just let you go that easily, unless the result is so bad that there's nothing to talk about.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Even if that is the case, you... still did come a bit too early.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I guess so... but we anticipated this current situation... a long time ago, didn't we?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: So, the discussions didn't go smoothly. I guess the situation is worse now, to the point where talks are about to break down.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What happened?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Military Council has gained support, and our information channels throughout Kazdel are shrinking.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Babel will likely come under siege in the fall.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Some of the Sarkaz betrayed us, which is to be expected.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But Babel is not fully prepared yet...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Sorry, Kal'tsit. By the looks of things, we won't keep it together that long.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: The King of the Nachzehrer and the rest of the royal court...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: They've only put forth a more demanding request. Don't worry, Kal'tsit, they're just targeting me.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: But... we no longer have the leeway to deal with more mistrust.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Theresa.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: What is it, Doctor? Ah... Right, I haven't formally solicited your advice yet, and it would be unbecoming of me to start giving orders rashly.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Doctor, it seems we'll need to get a bit further away from Kazdel. This calls for a full relocation, or in other words, a retreat.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Do you have a second opinion?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: This might be the only option.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: If possible... I would have liked to give everyone more options. But we're out of time.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: The Military Council's ideas are both too heavy-handed and direct, and I stood firmly opposed to their ideology. But to prevent Kazdel from making unnecessary sacrifices, we'll have to leave, temporarily.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I believe— I truly believe, that we share the same heart, and the same blood flows through us. But even blood can be separated and transfused, and I don't know when we'll be able to merge again.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: At least for now, separating is the least damaging option.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Every Sarkaz has a desire to follow her beliefs. I can feel your convictions, and there will be many Sarkaz following you.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: But I will not help you make a decision. I can only bear witness.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Yes. That's the best arrangement in front of us so far, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Alright then, without further ado, the two of you should pack up and get ready to set out!
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: How much can we take with us?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Unfortunately, not much. We may have to abandon a large number of our facilities. Ascalon will buy us time.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: That's more than enough, Theresa. You don't need to dispatch any more hands to help us. I'll bring the Doctor back to rendezvous with you safely.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Then we'll follow the pre-arranged plan, Kal'tsit. The person-in-charge will arrive later.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: But, Doctor, Kal'tsit, I'm sorry to make you evacuate in such a hurry.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: We'll have to put the research on hold for the time being... How I hoped to see the fruits that they would bear.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I'll work hard to create a space where we can continue our research. Finally...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I believe things will take a turn for the better.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: 13 days later
Kazdel Border, Babel Encampment, 'Dr. {@nickname}'s Camp'
Who are you?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Don't move.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: I'm not like those idiots getting themselves killed for no reason. I caught you alone.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: You shouldn't be doing this, Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Hah... Is that what someone in your shoes should be saying?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: I lost my patience a long time ago. Her Majesty... She even put you on a pedestal, letting you talk down to us.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: But you've done nothing for us at all! You don't understand us at all!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: You and that Feline aren't even Sarkaz. You don't belong in Kazdel.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: Now you swarm around Her Majesty, using that intimate position of yours to push the 'Babel' she dreams about.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: Don't make me laugh... Her Royal Majesty, Theresa, the great hero, thriving for a hundred years, she needs foreigners to direct her every move?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: I don't trust your ilk...! Outsiders who have nothing to do with us!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: You, 'Doctor,' to think that Her Majesty trusts you so much despite being an outsider, still act like a bystander. Let me hear it from you then, which side has a better chance of winning?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: The fact that you can only think of preserving your own hide—
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Proves how pathetic you are.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: How dare you—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: Are you done?
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Wha—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: ...Scout... what are you doing here?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: Don't underestimate Ascalon, traitor, let alone Her Majesty.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Her Majesty chose to be a missionary of benevolence, to allow people to get a taste of the right to freedom...
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: But you used that freedom to do something vile.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: You clearly know that Her Majesty respects the Doctor, and you've also heard the Doctor's public statements. This one has nothing to do with our 'civil war.'
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: But you, you took advantage of Her Majesty's kindness... and the Doctor's tolerance.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Maybe there's no need for me to judge you, traitor.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Scout!
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Doctor. I'm merely doing what has to be done.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: I get it, Scout.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: But he wanted answers from me.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: If he wanted to kill me, he could have done it already, instead of getting caught up in his choices.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: You're still saying that now...?
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Fine, you call the shots.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Let me talk to him, Scout.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Theresa won't mind.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Damn you... You want to talk reason, with a knife to my neck?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: Ridiculous... *cough*... Damn it...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: Why do you think Her Majesty has chosen to trust two outsiders?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Hah, haha... Why does Her Majesty trust you? It's nothing more than you using your rhetoric and silver tongue to manipulate fact and fiction.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: Ridiculous, hilarious... Her Majesty, our King with her lofty ideals, is buying into this clown show!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: Okay, Sarkaz... call me a clown, but I can't walk with Theresa anymore. That ship has sailed.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: You think you don't trust me. It's Her Majesty you don't trust.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: What gives you the right—?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: You're getting led around by the nose.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: You can't be a loyal vassal, you can't buy into her vision. All you've got is that title, 'Her Majesty', you can throw around to add weight to your choices.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Bullshit! You can talk like that about me?! You dare say that I don't believe in Her Majesty's way—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: Those were your words, not mine.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: You filthy outsider, choke on your own spit—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: Do you want to hear my opinion? I'll tell you, Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: I know for a fact that it's not my fault, or Kal'tsit's, that you lost faith in Her Majesty. You started to lose trust in her, and looked for someone else to blame.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: You talk out of your ass! If I really left Her Majesty, I would've taken your head with me!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: If it's really my fault you don't buy into Her Majesty's sermons anymore, why bother confronting me?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: You're scared of Her Majesty's strength? Or are you scared you can't change Her Majesty's mind?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: You're still lost. You don't know your own destiny. But 'He' wants it.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: It doesn't matter who 'you' are. He knows that there will always be people like you, and there will always be such a bridge.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Who are you talking about?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: They awakened you, worked you up, and it's not so I could listen to your talk.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: He wants to know what Theresa says, and how I react.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: I was never a part of the Council's plans.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: He needs to confirm this. Whether Theresa acquired any additional power.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Who the hell are you talking about? Dirty tricks, vague blathering, just to lure me into confessing to defection? Just to put on a show for Scout?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: No, Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: —I only want you to walk out of this place alive.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: Are you joking? What kind of joke is this?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: 'The one who can guide his people to survive, is the one crowned King in their hearts.'
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: I recognize you, 'traitor.'
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: That night, you carried the wounded Ascalon back to the camp, and it was you who brought the final message from the fallen soldiers to inform the whole army of the location of the recon team.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: So, I'm giving you this opportunity.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Impossible... Why should I believe you?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: Take a good look at the situation, traitor.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Regardless of what the Doctor says, you have no choice but to believe it.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: No, no! Scout, don't be deceived! The purpose of releasing me is to rehabilitate these lies! I'm not going anywhere!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: You want to slander me as one of Theresis's spies?! You don't have the slightest idea what I've been through— I am—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: Enough.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Your Majesty!
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Doctor... are you injured?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Your Majesty, this incident broke out so quickly because I didn't notice the situation within the team.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: No, I told Scout to stand down. Otherwise, this Sarkaz might have already been executed.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Y-Your Majesty... I...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: Ah... It's you.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Yes... When I was giving my sermon, you were standing below. You are one of the many faces in that crowd.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: What the Doctor said is right. You and your mercenaries have made military gains for us, but that... is not an excuse for your current actions.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Y-Your Majesty... I...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: You... don't trust me? Marco?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: You, who rescued so many of your compatriots and brought back information for us from the most dangerous of places. Now, you're no longer willing to trust me?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: No! No, no! I... I was just...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: (I can't even bear to look up at her... I...)
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: (What have I said...?)
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: Your Majesty.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: It seems that there won't be any use interrogating him.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: The situation is grim, and we need to evacuate imminently. We must immediately confirm whether there is any unrest with you among the team— or, if there is a Kazdel spy.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Please hand him over to Ascalon.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Yes... Before that, Doctor.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Can you tell me what he did to you just now?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: He didn't do anything.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Hmm.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: This might've been an assassination attempt, but I don't see that as the case.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Doctor!
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Theresa, if I was to say that he is by far the most innocent one, would you believe me?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: (Shrieks)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, This is no time to be cracking jokes. Scout probably doesn't see himself as a part of your skit either.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But at least this Sarkaz is indeed not on the list of spies that the captives named, Theresa.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Damned outsider! How dare you call Her Majesty by name...!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: Do you hate Kal'tsit...? Do you hate the Doctor?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Just because they are not Sarkaz? Not because of what they've done, or what they will do?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Yes, that's exactly right, Your Majesty!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: There are so many excellent people around you, so why do you insist on letting these outsiders—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: Shut your mouth!
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Yes... I understand what you mean.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Allow me to ask one more question. Scout, what's your verdict?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I respect your judgment, but per my opinion, he should be taken into custody immediately and locked up.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: According to military law, there can be only one outcome.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Indeed, this is but one choice. We are always faced with countless choices.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: No matter what schemes or designs he may have, he will be unable to resist that desire.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: This won't be the last time you see actions like this.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Theresa, if your tolerance creates further troubles, it will eventually threaten your safety.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: He simply made an unfortunate decision.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: No, Your Majesty...! P-Please, I can explain...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: I am... Sarkaz... a Sarkaz of Kazdel...! I just couldn't bear the thought... of you and Babel being so far away from Kazdel!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: Initially, this was the thing I resisted the most. Underhanded tactics and tricks... If this was not the only way to achieve a lasting peace, I would not be able to swallow this pill.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: But the Sarkaz have been waiting for too long.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Among the countless wars, we must utilize this war, along with equally innumerable lives, to open up this world and understand its emotions.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, Doctor, this will be the attitude I have towards you. We share the same beliefs, and we can complement each other. Therefore, I choose to respect the Doctor's choice.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Doctor, please tell me how you'd like this to end.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: This Sarkaz... He carried out an act of betrayal, not against me, but against an image of Theresa in his heart that had disappointed him.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: He cannot be called a traitor. As far as I can see, Her Majesty Theresa is willing to grant freedom to so many people—
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: —Why not exile this Sarkaz, and see what choices he makes?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Let him fend for himself upon this land.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: He may find a new faith, maybe in you, or someone else.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: —You... Why are you doing this...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: I'm opposed.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Even if the existing evidence does not prove his involvement with the Military Council, I do not deem it prudent to release a soldier who openly attacked his commander.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Theresa.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Y-Your Majesty...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: Leave it to the army.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Yes, Marco, you are... a Sarkaz mercenary.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: So, Scout, take him to see Ascalon.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Babel will decide your fate. Ascalon will decide your fate.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: That you consider yourself a Sarkaz of Kazdel means you cannot leave.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: —Your Majesty! You, you're putting me to death—?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: Scout, before he has any outbursts of emotion, restrain—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ——No!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: No! No! No! You— You're right— That's right, kill me! You're doing the right thing, sending a flake like me to hell!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: —You were a war hero! To execute a traitor, a nobody like me, is what you should do!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: Behave yourself!
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: I was wrong... I was wrong. Your Majesty, you still have what we long for, the story we've heard for decades!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: The banner of the six heroes still flies. How many have grown up listening to the tales of you leading the Sarkaz against foreign invaders? The masses wait for that era to come again!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: I've been waiting— We've all been waiting!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: We're still waiting for those legends to reappear, waiting for that bloodstained history to reignite!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: That is what Sarkaz should be— that is what the Sarkaz must be!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: Your Majesty! Now, this is justice. You have become justice!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: Your Majesty!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Traitor

attributes.content: This is the current situation. The mercenaries we've been able to contact will arrive in two days.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Whose team is it?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Hoederer's.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hoederer is an excellent commander, but he seems to despise war even more than he lets on.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I will ensure that he arrives on time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Good work, Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Perhaps one day... the Sarkaz can finally escape meaningless conflict and sacrifice.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: There's sorrow written all over your face. Is it because of the incident with Marco?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: In him... I saw a microcosm.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: The road ahead of us is still long, Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: It's too long, Theresa. Such that your people want an answer, and they want it placed before them.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But you'll accompany me down that road, won't you?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Of course...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That said, I heard you were doing some... fashion design last night?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Oh no, are you going to discipline me?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: No, why would I? Proper relaxation is necessary for stress relief.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The situation isn't optimistic. Your every move will affect the morale of all Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Theresa.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Hm, Doctor, what's the matter?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Ascalon sends word that Marco committed suicide, out of fear of punishment...
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: In order to avoid embarrassing his King.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Theresa...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I... I know.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Doctor... What are you going to do next?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: In addition to the mercenaries, all Sarkaz hiding under Kazdel's sphere of influence are paying close attention to our movements.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: This is a comprehensive relocation, and we have no margin of error when it comes to intelligence and logistics work.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Thank you... I'll speak with Ascalon later.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: She'll find good candidates.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Doctor...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Don't worry, I trust you.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Hopefully, the visions that I've seen will... No, rather, as long as we can still see, let us move forward a bit.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: I've already gotten used to it.
attributes.name: Doctor
